The tweet by Muhammad Arif: a former Pakistani army major, which mentioned the claim of 28 soldiers martyred in ceasefire violations by Pakistan on November 13.
The image of coffins covered with Indian: including actor Neelima Esai, which was claimed to be the evidence of the martyred soldiers.
The report by The Hindu stating that 11: including civilians and army soldiers, were killed in ceasefire violations by Pakistan on November 13.
The reverse image search conducted by Al: which found that the viral image of the coffins had been published on various websites over the years, including unrelated incidents such as a Maoist attack in Dantewada in 2010.
